alert.note: Alert for Camden; Chowan; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 17 at 4:02PM EST until November 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Pasquotank, Camden, Western Currituck, Chowan and Perquimans Counties. In Virginia, Norfolk/Portsmouth, Chesapeake, and Virginia Beach. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Chowan; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck
